description: This file defines hint-related functions for a word guessing game, including protocols for session and word objects, and functions to reveal positions or the first letter of the target word with hint limits.

classes.name: _WordLike
classes.description: Minimal interface for Word objects, requiring length and text attributes.

classes.name: _SessionLike
classes.description: Minimal interface for GameSession objects, requiring session state attributes and a save method.

methods.name: _ensure_can_use_hint
methods.description: Checks if a session can still use hints; raises ValueError if session is completed or hints limit reached.

methods.name: _increment_hints
methods.description: Increments hints used in session, respecting maximum hints limit, and saves the session.

methods.name: _pick_unrevealed_position
methods.description: Selects a random index in the target word that hasn't been revealed yet.

methods.name: _first_letter_position_and_value
methods.description: Returns position 0 and its corresponding letter from the target word.

methods.name: reveal_position
methods.description: Reveals a random unrevealed position and its letter, enforcing hint limits.

methods.name: reveal_first_letter
methods.description: Reveals the first letter of the target word, enforcing hint limits.
